@doyll: There is no need, I explained why is such thing bad and I always have advised against. Keep seeding back as much as you took (1.0084 ratio if you can) - and unload the torrent after two days. People on  slow connections will finish download by then... others must learn just to stuff their mouths only as much as they can swallow.

After 24h - in world of TV packs - starts Halloween - only bloodsucking bastards and come'n'goers would come - if missed they favored show by day - true fans know where they should be looking for. Not here, this is not the place for that... I don't want that. 

They suck dry (deplete) seeders seeding back - zero. Next week they happy go direction [eztv] where such behaviour is tolerated, even promoted by.

 I have 20-30 seeders max,  and these are same people, always. I know all of them...

Listen, I am here for people who cannot seed back - because with 10 kB/s or less prevent that - and I am willing to step in - for those... but - I want not to be ass-raped by guys WHO CAN DOWNLOAD WITH 1000 OR 6000 Kb/s and seed shit back - inventing excuses (and I hear them all) for being shitheaded hardfisting bastard.
